</MethodEndpoint>



ScoreCard

<Heading

</details><MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/json"}
    value={"application/json-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <div
          style={{"marginTop":"1rem","marginBottom":"1rem"}}
        >
          
          
          **1.To get [ values ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( IdentitySeer ):
          /riskIndicators/getDefaultRiskIndicators
          (**e.g.** 
          "values": [ \{ "id": 356,
          "type": "business",
          "code": "10",
          "description": "The input business name matches OFAC file",
          "category": "KYB",
          "type_ex_name": "Business Related Risk Indicators",
          "key": 356,
          "sequence": 1,
          "sub_sequence": 1,
          "status": "NA",
          "current": 0 \}, \{ "id": 357,
          "type": "business",
          "code": "11",
          "description": "The input business name matches non-OFAC global watchlist(s)",
          "category": "KYB",
          "type_ex_name": "Business Related Risk Indicators",
          "key": 357,
          "sequence": 1,
          "sub_sequence": 2,
          "status": "NA",
          "current": 0 \}] )
          
          **2.We can add multiple values seperated by comma (,) and add status (current) as "F"= 3 or "S" = 2 or "P" = 1**
          
          **3.To get [  processor  ], [   program   ], [   product   ] and [   group  ]:**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( IdentitySeer ):
          /score_card/get-user-based-programs
          (**e.g.** "processorId": 439, "program_id": "Test04102021", "group_id": "Test04102021", "product_id": "Test04102021")
          
          **4. To get [  idv_product  ] :**
          --&gt;Execute the API endpoint ( IdentitySeer ):
          /idv_flow/getIdvProducts
          (**e.g.**  "id": 1, "source": "LexisNexis", "internal_name": "SeerID")
          
          
        </div>
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"processor"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int64"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int64","default":378}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"idv_product"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"int32"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"integer","format":"int32","default":1}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"name"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"type":"string","default":"test12345"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"program"}
          required={false}

          required={false}

          collapsible={false}
          name={"group"}
          required={false}
          schemaName={"string"}

                qualifierMessage={undefined}

              >
